name: Russian Salad
description: Boiled potato, carrot, piquillo pepper, peas, pickles, green olives, tuna/bonito, shrimp, boiled egg.

name: Asparagus and ham puff pastries
description: Sheet puff pastry, 2 asparagus, slice serrano jam, edam cheese, sesame.
